page.title: 17BALLATER FIELD CENTRE
page.content: Housed in the old village school, Ballater Field Centre exists to provide support and accommodation for Environmental Education in Grampian Region. It is used by schools and community groups. The aim is to give, all the year round, a stimulating learning experience in a diverse and attractive environmental setting. The Regional Council has recently approved the Â£55,000 needed to bring the sleeping and washing facilities for both staff and students up to a comfortable standard.The centre has a well-stocked library and resource materials of all kinds. A fully equiped meteorological station is maintained. For fieldwork trips while staying at the centre the students use cycles or cross-country skiis. For trips further afield there is a mini-bus available.
